chunks.text: GPUs - Announcements: Project Presentation Schedule GPUs - Announcements: Project Presentation Schedule Posted Monday, November 24, 2025 8:17 PM EST Folks, If you check the last two lectures in the table in Content --> Lecture Slides & Reading Material you will find the schedule of the presentations presented as group number. The main heuristic we used is for larger groups to present first. Due to the very large number of projects this time, in both days (Dec 3 and Dec 10) we may go well beyond the lecture time. So, if you have another commitment after the lecture of your assigned day, please email me ASAP. If I don't hear from you by the end of the day Wed the 26th, I will assume you are OK with your assigned slot. Thanks Z GPUs Go to Announcements >> You are receiving this message because you subscribed to receive instant notifications via email. Change Notification Settings
